author: Archimedes
title: [Opera] / Archimedis Syracusani philosophi et mathematici ingeniosissimi per Nicolaum Tartaleam ... multis erroribus emendata, expurgata, ac in luce posita ... commentariolis ... eruditissimis aperta, explicata atque illustrata
imprint: "Venetijs : Per Venturinum Ruffinellum sumptu & requisitione Nicolai de Tartaleis Brixiani, 1543, mense Aprili"
